game_description: Olly Power Play is an exciting target-based throwing game set on a breathtaking island with over 150 levels that challenge you in a variety of game modes. Smash apples, pears, yumberries and more as you achieve new high scores and personal bests! Rock & Metal Blockers are presented in higher levels that put you in between a rock and a hard place! Experience Blitz Mode, where youâ€™re taken on a Fruit Frenzy to test your speed and accuracy through a variety of levels where the lowest score wins. How low can you go? Compete with family & friends in Party Mode, play online in Oculus Challenges, or enjoy every level with Olly in solo mode. Monitor your scores with Player Performance Stats and our advanced players can now earn a Champion Star Ranking. Get ready to set your name as #1 on a variety of online leaderboards! Join Olly for an immersive VR experience where visual, audio, and haptic effects add to every throw! Youâ€™ll have a blast with Olly Power Play. 3â€¦2â€¦1â€¦ Letâ€™s Play!
review_1: It's been half a decade since I've embraced VR, so I'm generally sick of these 'standing arcade games', be they throwers or zombie shooters or whatever. That being said, this is a well made game. The graphics are still 'VR Performant Pastel', but have more heft than most. This is a thick enough experience to be worth releasing, I suppose.
review_2: This game is well made, and the mechanics of the game works amazingly. I love the environment of the game. Also, Olly is fun and interactive. I recommend this game to my friends.
review_3: I absolutely love this game, there are so many levels and 3 different areas to choose from! It's so much fun and a challenge at times, which I enjoy. Olly is the cutest little friend/partner along side you as you play. You can pick on him by throwing fruits at him which is funny, or wait for him to throw you some golden fruits to score more points with! I highly recommend getting this game for yourself and trying it out! 3..2..1.. LET'S PLAY! ðŸ˜Š
review_4: The physics are good and the feeling is fine when you launch the fruit.
review_5: It's a great game to train aiming, it seems easy, but it gets more and more complicated, it would be fun to play with more people at the same time. Totally recommended!
